title: HI RIOT
body: I GET REPORTED A LOT OF TIME CUS THEY THINK I WAS AFK BUT ALWAYS IS GAME CRUSHING AND DISCONNCTS

replies.body: Leaving games even unintentionally causes negative experiences for other players, even if you don't mean to!  If you keep leaving, you'll also end up in a[ lower priority queue](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) for a significant amount of games.  It's really important that this gets fixed so you can play without interruption.  Let me know the issue you're having with more details than this, and I can try to help.  Let me know!
